report.name: consit

dataSource.name: Q_1
dataSource.select: select R.rnom, R.rprenom, R.rtype, I.IADRABR, R.batiment, R.etage, R.bureau, R.rtel, S.ident, S.datdep, S.codsg, S.datsitu, S.soccode, DECODE(S.soccode, 'SG..', '******', trim(TO_CHAR(S.cout, '9990D00'))) AS cout, S.montant_mensuel, S.PRESTATION, R.matricule, T.libdsg, DECODE(S.soccode, 'SG..',S.NIVEAU, '**') AS NIVEAU, s.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, R.IGG from situ_ress S, ressource R, struct_info T, IMMEUBLE I where S.ident = R.ident and S.ident = :P_PARAM6 and S.codsg = T.codsg and R.ICODIMM = I.ICODIMM(+) order by datsitu desc

dataSource.name: Q_2
